questions.question_text: A technician would like to repurpose hard drives that contain PII. Which of the following would be the best solution to securely remove the data?

discussion.content:
D. Chain of custody
A chain of custody is a detailed, written record of the sequence of custody, control, transfer, analysis, and disposition of physical or electronic evidence. It documents every step in the evidence handling process, from the time it is collected at a crime scene to its presentation in court.

By maintaining a meticulous chain of custody, investigators can ensure the integrity and admissibility of evidence in legal proceedings. Any break in the chain of custody can compromise the evidence and potentially lead to its exclusion from court.

questions.question_text: Which of the following documents in criminal proceedings must be updated every time a piece of evidence is touched or transferred in order for the evidence to be considered valid?

An organization is updating the monitors on kiosk machines. While performing the upgrade, the organization would like to remove physical input devices. Which of the following utilities in the Control Panel can be used to turn on the on-screen keyboard to replace the physical input devices?

discussion.content:
B. Ease of Access
The Ease of Access Control Panel provides options to configure various accessibility features, including the on-screen keyboard. By enabling the on-screen keyboard, users can input text without physical keyboard and mouse. This can be useful in kiosk scenarios where physical input devices are not desired or practical.

Google Gemini

questions.question_text: A large organization is researching proprietary software with vendor support for a multiuser environment. Which of the following EULA types should be selected?

discussion.content:
A. Corporate
A corporate license is designed for organizations and provides the necessary rights and permissions for multiple users within the company. It often includes features like volume licensing, software updates, and technical support.

Other options, like perpetual, open-source, and personal, are not suitable for a multi-user environment within a large organization.

Google Gemini
